title: Johnny Smrdel from Beloved and Advent
itunes:title: Johnny Smrdel from Beloved and Advent
description:
The conclusion of our month focused on the great state of North Carolina and their vibrant punk and hardcore scene features none other than Johnny Smrdel from Beloved and Advent. We discuss his life as a Navy brat, identity and working hard. As always, thanks for the support of the show and please share around! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
